text: To further protect the El Pollo Loco® System while this Agreement is in effect, Developer and each officer, director, shareholder, member, manager, partner and other equity owner, as applicable, of Developer, if Developer is an entity, shall neither directly nor indirectly own, operate, control or any financial interest in any other business which would constitute a "Competitive Business" (as hereinafter defined) without the prior written consent of Franchisor; provided further, that Franchisor may, as its sole and absolute right, consent to the Developer's continued operation of any business already in existence and operating at the time of execution of this Agreement.
label: No

text: This Agreement will automatically terminate in the event of its "assignment" (as such term is defined for purposes of Section 15(a) (4) of the Investment Fund Act).
label: No

text: ESTABLISHMENT shall permit APOLLO and its agents, during business hours and upon notice to ESTABLISHMENT, to inspect the Facilities where the Product is manufactured, handled, stored or tested, as well as all processes relating to the manufacture, handling, storage, or testing of the Product, as well as all test records regarding the Product.
label: No

text: Each Party hereby assigns to the other Party a joint equal and undivided interest in and to all Joint Inventions (including Joint Improvements) to effect such joint ownership of such Joint Inventions (including Joint Improvements).
label: No

text: If the Net Product Sales Amounts in the Territory exceeds [***] during any Calendar Year after any Quarterly Payment has been made, MMT shall automatically accrue a credit of [***] (the "Credit Amount") (representing the additional [***] fee that MMT would be entitled to receive with respect to the first [***] of the Quarterly Collected Revenue as a result of total Net Product Sales Amounts in the relevant Calendar Year having [***]), which Credit Amount will be deducted from future payments of Quarterly Collected Revenue to SIGA until the full Credit Amount is retained by MMT.
label: No
